name: Clockwork Beetle Swarm
description: A large collective of mechanical beetles that move and attack as a single unit, featuring a hard outer shell that provides natural armor.
memorable: The Clockwork Beetle Swarm is notable for its remarkable resistances and immunities, making it a durable foe in combat, as well as its ability to occupy the same space as other creatures.
goals: Typically engages in aggressive encounters, overwhelming enemies through sheer numbers.
relations: Related to other mechanical constructs or swarms, potentially serving or allied with them.
environment: Often found in technologically advanced areas or ruins, possibly near factories or magical constructs.
strengths: Immunities to poison and psychic damage, resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.
weaknesses: Very low intelligence and charisma hinders ability to strategize or communicate.
attacks: Uses Bites action to deal significant piercing damage with additional poison damage, making it a lethal threat.
most_powerful_ability: Magic Resistance grants advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.
senses: Darkvision allows the swarm to see in darkness up to 60 feet.
additional_information: Does not require air, food, drink, or sleep due to Construct Nature.
Can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny Construct.
Cannot regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.
test_queries: swarm that can fly and walk
agile construct with high damage potential
